name: Ninslash
description:
Hey!

It's unpolished and unfinished, but the gameplay is mostly there. If you love games like Soldat, Teeworlds and N++, watch the gameplay trailer and give Ninslash a shot.

Ninslash is a multiplayer PvP and PvE platformer. It's fast and unforgiving, so prepare to die. Embrace it, enjoy it, and try avoiding it with mouse and keyboard.

You can change the gamemode and server settings in-game, by 'Call Vote' menu. Local server can be started by running ninslash_srv.exe.
